app.title: Backdoor
app.desc: Backdoor is a platform for competitive computer security challenges. Frequent competitions are held on Backdoor with participants from all over the world.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique log

fields.name: created_at
fields.desc: time of when the log was created

fields.name: user_id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique user

fields.name: flag_id
fields.desc: integer to identify the flag submitted by the user

fields.name: match
fields.desc: indicates whether the flag submitted was valid

fields.name: id
fields.desc: integer to identify a unique flag

fields.name: flag
fields.desc: 64 byte long hexadecimal string representing a flag

collections.name: challenges
collections.desc: Each challenge has an associated valid flag with it

fields.name: name
fields.desc: the name of the challenge. This is used in the url eg: https://backdoor.sdslabs.co/challenges/MEDUSA

fields.name: flag_id
fields.desc: integer to identify the flag associated with the challenge

fields.name: creator
fields.desc: integer to identify the user who created this challenge

fields.name: created_at
fields.desc: time of challenge creation i.e. addition to the backdoor platform
